Say The Same Thing!

Rules:

1. Begin the game by entering any word you can think of.
2. Each time When each other.
3. If you said the same word, You win!!
4. If not, play repeats, and each player comes up with a new word that relates to both of the previous words you came up with.
5. Continue coming up with words until you say the same thing!

- If you come up with a word that you both think is essentially the same thing (ie: game & games) you can hit the button below.
- This button acts as a "close enough" button. And if both players agree that what you said is basically the same thing, You win!

YOU WON!

It took you and ___ xx turns!
